title: Pickled Jalapeno Peppers
directions: Combine water, vinegar, sugar, salt, garlic, peppercorns and oregano in a saucepan over high heat. Bring mixture to a boil, stir in jalapeno peppers and remove from heat. Let mixture cool for 10 minutes.
Pack peppers into jars using tongs, cover with vinegar mixture, cover, and refrigerate until needed.
